1.name: Critical Frontend Proof Pipeline Fixes

milestones.name: Hex secrets have 0x prefix in all circuit inputs
Fake address fallback replaced with valid Field values
Draw winner_id uses correct value (3 not 0)
Settlement hand proof ordering correct for both players
Move proofs not double-counted
Grumpkin private key validated within scalar field range
Board state snapshot taken before UI update for proofs
Proof-to-field conversion correct for settlement
Frontend builds successfully

1.verify_command: cd packages/frontend && npm run build 2>&1 | tail -10

2.name: Deploy Script & Contract Data Fixes

milestones.name: Deploy script card ranks match game-logic card database
VK hash computation uses correct bb.js method
Game escrow lock prevents mid-game reclaim
Card transfer restricted to game-participating cards
Contracts compile with aztec compile

3.name: Circuit Security Hardening

milestones.name: grumpkin_private_key != 0 assertion added to game_move

Opponent pubkey validated on Grumpkin curve
game_move circuit compiles with nargo compile
Frontend encryption updated to match circuit nonce
Frontend builds successfully
